snippet: Reporters, editors and those who monitor the freedom of the press describe a harsh environment for reporters, in the United States and abroad.
abstract: Reporters, editors and those who monitor freedom of the press are describing harsh environment for reporters both at home and abroad, complicated by changes in way that journalists work, and change in way they are viewed by both governments, and public.
